# isBrowser

> Check if the runtime is a web browser.


<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var isBrowser = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-browser' );
```

#### isBrowser

`Boolean` indicating if the runtime is a web browser.

``` javascript
var bool = isBrowser;
// returns <boolean>
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples

``` javascript
var isBrowser = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-browser' );

console.log( isBrowser );
// => <boolean>
```

<!-- </examples> -->
